description.name: bnberc20
description.tagline: Binance Coin erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-bnb Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Binance Coin erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/bnb receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/bnb wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
